title: Interpretation of seeing a grandfather in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a grandfather in a dream according to the dreamer’s interpretation of Ibn Sirin and details related to his real life. Therefore, in this article today, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a grandfather in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a grandfather in a dream Ibn Sirin’s interpretationDreams are a very large and vast world and they always concern many people. Dreams are a mysterious world whose secrets and mysteries cannot be revealed by everyone. That is why the science of dream interpretation appeared and there are many scientists specializing in this science. But this science cannot be established in a fundamental way, because it is a science based on guesswork and not on logic. The interpretation of a dream does not have to be correct. Always, sometimes it is right and sometimes it is wrong. The unseen is the knowledge of God alone, He has no partner, and He alone knows the unseen. Therefore, one does not need to rely entirely on the interpretation of his dream, but rather one must take the reasons and rely on God and the good faith of God Almighty. Psychologists have confirmed that the interpretation of a dream varies depending on the dreamer and his personal, psychological, social and financial situation. Among the dreams that are repeated often Dreams of seeing a grandfather or great-grandfather, because of their great and very special status with their grandchildren. Interpretation of seeing a grandfather in a dream In most cases, this dream indicates nostalgia for the past, the absence of the grandson’s grandfather, and the lack of a sense of safety and security that he enjoyed in the company of his grandfather. If the grandfather dies, this The dream shows the great loss that the grandson will feel. If the dreamer is suffering from financial problems or family problems, then the grandfather in the dream means blessing, goodness, and abundance of life, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my dead grandfather alive in a dream: If the dreamer sees his deceased grandfather in his dream with a beautiful and smiling appearance, this means He will be blessed, God willing, in the next home. Some scholars believe that seeing the dead in a dream indicates the obligation to pray for the dead, and the dream is a reminder of living with the rights of mothers over them. If the grandson had a close relationship with his grandfather and saw in a dream that his deceased grandfather had come to sit with him. This is It indicates that God will reward him with goodness, God willing. He will soon find peace in his life, but he will have to be patient. Grandparents are always a blessing and a source of security and affection in the home. Therefore, seeing them in a dream always indicates the need for grandchildren to take care of them and embrace them with love. If The dreamer is waiting for news of a promotion in his work or is waiting for the success of a business deal. He saw in his dream that his grandfather came to him smiling, and in this case, God willing, he will find that the dreamer achieved what he wanted. If the grandfather is famous in this world, then his presence in the dream is a blessing, food, and an abundance of goodness, God willing. God. The interpretation of seeing a grandfather in a dream for a married woman always indicates stability in the home and a peaceful relationship between the wife and her husband, God willing. This dream is considered a strong signal to keep her at home, in an attempt to prevent any interference from any external elements. If the deceased grandfather comes in a dream and he protects The dreamer of an unknown item, this dream indicates the presence of someone who wants evil in the situation. Of course the dreamer should

title: Interpretation of a dream about magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It is worth noting that seeing magic is one of those visions that many people have, as it is considered one of the disturbing visions, which prompts many dreamers to search for explanations and interpretations. Whoever sees this dream, or it is considered a bad sign, and in this context we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about magic in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. There may be many interpretation scholars, including the scholar Ibn Sirin, who tried to clarify the interpretations and meanings contained in this vision, Warning and warning messages to the dreamer, and during this paragraph we will explain to you. Interpretation of a dream about magic in a dream by Ibn Sirinho also: Whoever sees in a dream that he is doing magic and spells. This vision is evidence that the dreamer is a liar and an immoral person, as he is doing a forbidden act. Likewise, he must repent to God. He is exalted and demands honesty in his actions and words. It is also the case that he sees magic and wants to decode it through spells. It indicates that he continues to commit what God Almighty has forbidden. Seeing a magician in the street is evidence that there is someone who claims to be knowledgeable, and someone who gives fatwas to people about matters Religion, and he is considered one of the ignorant people who issue fatwas to people of his religion and world. See also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing robes in a dream by Ibn Sirin for married and single women. Interpretation of a dream about magic from someone I know, especially since dreams related to magic include many different interpretations, based on the details that we see in the dream, and during this paragraph We learn about the interpretation of a dream about magic from someone I know. He also says: Whoever sees that there is magic makes him a different person. It indicates the presence of adversity and many problems that await this person. Also, if one sees in a dream that there is magic described by a friend or relative. Also, if one sees in a dream that there is magic described by a friend or relative. This magic will affect his marriage and personal life. This spell is also evidence of the delay in this young man’s marriage if he is young, or the corruption of his family life if he is married. See also: Interpretation of seeing falafel in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing falafel in a dream. Seeing magic in a dream for a married woman, as this The interpretations and explanations contained in the dreams in which we see magic and sorcery differ after those details that appear in the dream, and they also differ according to the social status of the viewer, and in this paragraph they will talk about it. The interpretation of seeing magic in a dream for a married woman is also: Seeing magic in a married woman’s dream is evidence of many problems and disputes that this woman will be exposed to. Seeing magic is also evidence of the presence of a person in her life who wants to harm her, and God is Most High and knows that. While seeing buried magic In a dream about a married woman. It is evidence of this woman’s lack of commitment to worshiping and obeying God. If the married woman dreams that she has touched magic. It is a sign of the failure of her relationship with her husband. Seeing the breaking of magic in a dream is considered a good vision, and if a married woman sees in a dream that she She decodes magic. This vision is evidence of this woman’s closeness to God Almighty. By God

title: White clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about wearing white clothes, and the interpretation of a dream about buying white clothes.

preview.html: White clothes in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about white clothes in a dream is one of the visions that bode well for most dream interpretation scholars, such as Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others, and this is general, but if we want to analyze the interpretation of dreams. This dream. We must go into all the details that may appear in a person’s vision, and we will list some of them in the following lines. White clothes in a dream. Many scholars tend to interpret this dream as an expression of the goodness that befalls the dreamer in all matters of this world and the hereafter, if this person usually He often wears white clothes in his daily life, but if he has a profession and does not use it. To wear white. In general, his vision of white clothes may reflect his holidays and vacations. Some have resorted to interpreting it as comfort and tranquility that touches the dreamer’s soul, and here is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of these visions: Interpretation of a dream about white clothes by Imam Ibn Sirin and pointed out that it is a sign of the comfort and tranquility that the Divine lives and that he is a generous man and gives For free, and that the crises that this person went through in his life will end and his life will turn into good if God wants. As for the interpretation of white clothes in a dream, that is, when a person sees white clothes in a dream, and in reality he loves this color and wears it, this is evidence of his righteousness and piety. During the coming period, he will have to wait for more time with work and perseverance. Interpretation of a dream about wearing white clothes: Many interpreters believe that wearing white clothes in a dream indicates remorse for something, repentance, and seeking forgiveness after straying from the path of guidance and justice. Otherwise, it is dirty or rude. This indicates that you are entering into great anxiety that may last for some time until you get rid of it, knowing that white woolen clothes are a sign of the arrival of large amounts of money to this person. If the white clothes in the dream of a divorced or widow were very clean and white. For her, this was a sign of good circumstances, fulfillment of desires, and a way out of the crises she had experienced in the previous period of her life. Buying white clothes in a dreamInterpretation of buying white clothes in a dream by Ibn SirinIf the clothes that a person buys in his dream are old, worn clothes, this means the return of some Old memories that were re-enacted in his life, such as the return of a previous relationship or the end of a problem between two quarrels that lasted a lot and will be resolved soon. As for buying dirty white clothes, the vision indicates negative events that may happen to the dreamer and he may fall into many problems in his personal or professional life. The vision is an indication of the importance of this person’s readiness to face the difficulties that he will encounter. As for the new white clothes that the sleeper buys in the dream, they indicate, from Ibn Sirin’s point of view, happy events that will happen to this person according to what he wants. If a young man desires to get married, this is good news for obtaining a suitable wife. Interpretation of a dream about white clothes for single women. If he sees bright white clothes, this is good news about his good condition and that he

title: Interpretation of seeing a severed head in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a severed human head in a dream or dreams: The cut shows the missing thing, and the head is the upper part of the human body and is one of the most important organs that contains the skull and brain. Seeing a missing organ in a dream is one of the dreams that causes anxiety and panic, and the person quickly goes to revive the meaning behind this vision, so we will clarify many interpretations about seeing the severed head, so they tired me out. Interpretation of seeing the severed head of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a severed head in a dream is a sign of surrender. People to the dreamer. Seeing a head being cut off in a dream. A person being cut off is a good sign that affects the viewer’s livelihood, money, and work. Seeing a head being cut off and then repeating it again. His position indicates the dreamer’s death as a witness. If a prisoner sees his head cut off in a dream without knocking, this indicates the release of his prison. The severed head is a reference. Chapter: Seeing a severed head in the dreamer’s hand is a sign that he will receive money and food like this head. Seeing a severed head placed in a blood vessel indicates that the dreamer is a liar and a deceiver in the dreamer’s life. A man cutting off his own head indicates his betrayal, disloyalty or disagreement with his duties and worship. If he sees any If a person is headed by his boss or guardian, he will have his head cut off. It is a sign of loss of worry, anxiety, and liberation for the pioneer. See also: Interpretation of seeing a golden earring in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a severed head in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a head being cut off in a dream indicates breaking her parents’ guardianship by marrying her soon. Seeing a single girl with her head cut off And it is separated from her body, and it contains blood. It is a sign of her relationship with someone who is not good for her and it will be an unsuccessful relationship. Seeing many heads in a woman’s dream is an indication of the approaching marriage and the abundance of food that will come to her. Interpretation of seeing a severed head in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a severed head in a married woman’s dream is an indication of The control of her life by her husband and children. Seeing a severed head in her hand is evidence of betrayal. Seeing a severed head in a dream of a bloodless family member arguing unfairly and stupidly. See also: Interpretation of seeing a gold earring in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a severed head in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a severed head in a dream for a pregnant woman to end her pregnancy easily. And cutting the umbilical cord at birth. Seeing the heads of a pregnant woman announces the goodness that comes her way. The severed head indicates a lack of wisdom and inability to manage things. Interpretation of seeing a severed head in a dream for a man. Seeing a severed man’s head for freedom from slavery, freedom from debts, and acquittal from prison. Seeing a severed man The head and holding it in his hand is a sign of his betrayal. Seeing a man cutting off his head with his hand indicates that the priest knows the truth and does not follow it. Seeing a man cutting off the head after committing a crime in a dream indicates the loss of one of his parents or children. If a man sees his head cut off, a bird comes and takes it, Fidel, for the fortune-teller to collect it, so a leader comes. And he took it from him. Seeing him being hit on the head and cutting it off and suffering in his sleep is a public sign that he committed many sins and disobedience. See also: Interpretation of seeing a severed hand in a dream. Dear visitors of the Vision website in case there is any problem or inquiry about it. Interpretation of seeing a severed hand in a dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing clothes burning in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of burning clothes by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing and lighting a fire in a dream means removing worries and offering goodness and happiness, and God knows best. Also, seeing a burning fire in a dream may indicate an abundance of food and the removal of worries, and it may also indicate the dreamer’s good circumstances, and God knows best. Also, seeing clothes on fire strongly indicates that the dreamer will participate in a prestigious job, high status, and a lot of financial gains. Interpretation of seeing clothes on fire for unmarried women: If an unmarried girl dreams that her clothes are on fire in an unmarried girl’s dream, there is a lot of happiness and good news. Also, Seeing a burning fire in a dream with new clothes could indicate the death of worries, problems, and sorrows, and repentance from God Almighty. Also, seeing burning clothes for an unmarried girl may indicate excellence and brilliant success in her academic and professional life, and God knows best. Seeing fire burning in many clothes in a dream For an unmarried pet, it may indicate her close marriage to a just man who enjoys a high status. Interpretation of seeing burning clothes for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream a burning fire in her clothes that she buys new ones, then this vision indicates the death of worries and sorrows. Also, seeing a burning fire may indicate In a dream, it indicates the collapse of marital disputes that the girl is going through, and it also indicates abundant food and money. Also, seeing burning clothes in a dream may mean that dreams and goals come true. Interpretation of seeing fire in clothes for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream, and seeing fire burning in her clothes, means that The worries and sorrows that a woman goes through are gone, and God knows best. Also, seeing a burning fire in a dream can indicate a lot of happiness and nourishment, as well as the ease of things and the ease of childbirth without pain. Interpretation of seeing a man burning with clothes: To see sweet in his dream, to see clothes on fire. It means removing worries, and if the clothes are old, this indicates happiness. Also, seeing married people’s clothes burning may indicate the collapse of the disputes that arise between them and a happy married life. Also, seeing a burning fire with red and new clothes may mean that the dreamer will participate in a new and prestigious job. And many will appear for the sake of a living. This vision can also indicate a new life full of love, happiness and pleasure, and it can also indicate occasions and joys, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you. As soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing reading or hearing Surat Al-Shura in a dream

preview.html: Surat Al-Shura in a dream indicates longevity for the dreamer and abundance of knowledge. Reading it also indicates enjoying good health or recovering from illness. It is one of the surahs of the Holy Qur’an that many people see regardless of whether it is a man, a woman, or a girl in a dream for each of them. Seeing Surat Al-Shura or a surah from the Holy Qur’an in a dream, this dream has many different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Shura in a dream. Seeing a single girl in a dream or hearing Surat Al-Shura indicates many meanings and signs. The most important of these interpretations is that this vision shows that this The girl enjoys a lot. Between the good qualifications and good morals, and also that this girl is a knowledgeable girl who has a lot of knowledge among other girls. But when a married woman hears Surat Al-Shura in her dream, it also indicates this woman. She is ready to obey her husband in all aspects of life, She is also prepared. title: Interpretation of roses in a dream Giving white and red roses in a dream

preview.html: Roses for the pregnant woman A bouquet of red, white and pink roses for the married woman - Ibn Sirin Roses Interpretation of flowers and roses in a dream A beautiful red rose in a dream could be a warning about a particular problem or problem Roses are a symbol of many values, especially love and loyalty Roses in our dreams may indicate the greatness of life around us, but We must be careful, as not all roses are innocent. Interpretation of roses in a dream for a single woman. A rose in an unmarried woman’s dream is an expression of pure emotion and in the language of the dream it indicates the emergence of something that brings joy and happiness. An unmarried girl who receives in her dream a bouquet of white roses as a gift, may receive In reality, a marriage proposal from a noble person with high morals. Interpretation of red roses in a dream. Red roses express desires or dangers, and in a dream it is an explicit warning, especially if a woman sees that there are thorns or thorns with some marks or wounds on them. All other colors of roses are worthy of praise in a dream. What In addition to yellow and blue, roses indicate that you are receiving good news or good news. A large number of roses in the house indicates the happiness of his family. Interpretation of picking roses in a dream. As for picking and picking roses in a dream, it means practical or emotional success. It is preferable in the visions to see the girl as if she is sleeping next to the roses or to see roses decorating her room or her clothes. Roses in dreams indicate kind words, while thorns on roses indicate hurtful words. Interpretation of roses in a dream for a married woman. If the appearance of roses in a married woman’s dream is happy, it is an occasion for optimism and hope, especially if the married woman is suffering from turmoil or a crisis. If a married woman sees If her husband gives her a bouquet of roses, this likely has a positive connotation, and roses in this context are an expression of friendship and peace, as well as love. The dream is interpreted according to the feelings that accompany this gift. If a married woman feels great happiness as a result of accepting this flower or this bouquet, this indicates the goodness that she will encounter in waking life. Interpretation of roses in a dream for a pregnant woman. A rose can carry many messages in this dream, as it is a title. For optimism and a symbol of love, it is associated with emotion and shows the end of problems and worries, especially if it is white. Interpretation of white roses in a dream. White roses in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate safety or calm and are associated with goodness in general, and seeing them indicates recovery or the end of problems with pregnancy and childbirth. Interpretation of a single rose in a dream perhaps A single rose indicates a baby girl. It is also praiseworthy in visions to see a pregnant woman receiving a bouquet of roses as a gift from someone she knows, or as a gift of roses themselves. In both cases there is an expression of affection between her and the person she saw in the dream. Interpretation of buying roses in a dream is also praiseworthy. Buying roses in a dream because they are an expression of a good deed or a happy event, and roses in a dream can generally indicate the depth of friendships or the strengthening of relationships.

title: I dreamed that my mother was killing a snake, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my mother was killing a snake. This vision is one of the visions that brings to those who see it many feelings of discomfort and fear, because the snake is a type of reptile whose presence is always associated with harm and damage, and in this article we will present its interpretation. Knowing that God alone knows the unseen and what we offer, what is the jurisprudence of jurists? I dreamed that my mother was killing a snake. This dream is considered one of the dreams that have many meanings, some of which are given and others are a test. While in another interpretation, it is like finding comfort after distress and joy after misery. It can also be full of good human beings who will be the reason for new prosperity in the lives of those who see it and will bring with it. More happiness. I dreamed that my mother was killing a snake by Ibn Sirin. The meaning refers to the unfortunate events that the visionary is exposed to, which revolutionize the path of his life, but they end soon. It may also express a suitable job opportunity that satisfies his ambitions and sense of self. Sometimes it is an expression of what the mother does to support herself in the difficult times she is facing. I dreamed that my mother killed a snake for an unmarried woman. Watching a single girl. This vision indicates a stage in her life that she is experiencing full of trials and difficulties, and in dire need of someone to support her, especially those closest to her. It indicates that he succeeded in what he sought and fought for his hopes and ambitions. I dreamed that my mother killed a snake for the sake of the married woman. The dream shows the extent to which she feels the need to help those around her to overcome the obstacles she faces in her life and to find in her mother what she needs. A disturbed and general calm returned to their lives. I dreamed that my mother was killing a pregnant snake. Seeing a pregnant woman in this dream indicates the suffering she goes through during pregnancy and her mother standing by her side until this crucial stage of her life ends. It exhausts her and causes her great sadness and anguish, and sometimes it is just an expression of anxiety and fear within her at this time, especially if it is the first pregnancy..I dreamed that my mother killed a snake for the sake of the divorced woman. The interpretation explains that she overcame the feelings of disappointment that she experienced due to a failed experience that prevented her. Without what she wanted to create a stable family, sadness leads to optimism and good faith in God, and at other times salvation from Him appears. Deceiving a friend who invades her life to destroy it.. I dreamed that my mother killed a snake for a man, meaning getting rid of the financial distress that was causing him distress and which would revolutionize his life and his family would stand by his side to overcome it, in happy events that would be appropriate to change his situation from sadness and anxiety. To comfort him after a period of adversity, it may indicate that he has abandoned a sin that he committed and continues.. I dreamed that my mother kills a black snake. A dream about a black snake expresses the presence of many who carry feelings of grudges and hatred, so one should not trust those who do not deserve it. Through an internal conflict that almost destroys him, he does not give in to this feeling and turns to God, so he finds refuge, and in another interpretation, it is an indication that there is always someone who helps him and he must thank God. to

title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a tooth falling out in a dream without blood, according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see teeth falling out in a dream without blood, there are many visions that a person sees in a dream that cause him anxiety and fear, which prompts him to search for interpretations of this vision and its results and what it brings in terms of good aspects for its owner or warning against evil. And the appearance of this dream is one of the dreams that its owner fears. Interpretation scholars worked on interpreting this vision based on the social status of the dreamer and the events of the dream, interpretation of the dream of seeing a tooth falling out in a dream without blood. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a tooth falling out in a dream without pain by Ibn Sirin, where the respected interpreter Ibn Sirin worked on interpreting the different visions that a person sees in a dream with a set of indications and interpretations that he specified in his interpretive books. If a person sees himself in a dream and his tooth falls out and is damaged, this is evidence that he has taken money from illegal sources and committed things that are contrary to the Islamic religion. If a person eats and sees his teeth falling out during it, this is one of the unpleasant visions that indicate his loss of money. When a person sees in a dream that his teeth have fallen out without blood, this indicates the dreamer's tension and anxiety about losing something dear to his heart that has great value. A tooth falling out in a man's dream without blood is an indication that he will live for a long time, but he will say goodbye to many people due to death. See also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing rice and meat in a dream for a single and married woman in Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream of seeing a tooth falling out in a dream without blood for the real Imam, where it differs Interpretations of dreams from one scholar to another, but most often the scholars of interpretation agree on a set of points in general, as seeing teeth falling out in a dream without blood means, according to the interpretation of the majority of scholars, anxiety, loss. And feeling lonely, and one of the most prominent interpretations of this vision of Imam Al-Sadiq: Seeing someone keeping his lost tooth in his pocket is a sign of longevity. Teeth in a dream refer to friends, relatives, and something expensive and valuable. A molar that falls without blood in a traveler's dream is an indication that he will remain in place for a long time and will remain alone away from his relatives. If one sees in his dream a molar falling without blood, this is an indication that the owner of the vision will suffer from some health problems, he or a member of his family. A tooth falling out in a dream indicates the death of someone close to the dreamer, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If someone dreams of a tooth falling out, but he does not find it, this means that the owner of the vision is approaching anxiety, worries and sadness in his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing carrots in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tooth falling out in a dream without blood by Al-Nabulsi There are also many similarities between the interpretations of the scholar Al-Nabulsi, and between the interpretations and interpretations that the scholar Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq worked to provide. One of the most prominent and important interpretations of a molar falling out in a dream without blood, according to Imam Al-Nabulsi, is the following: If a person sees in his dream that he is losing all of his teeth, this indicates the death of all of his family members. If a person sees that his tooth has fallen out without him feeling it, then this indicates the death of all of his family members.

title: Seeing a dead father in a dream

preview.html: If the father was sick and died in the dream and he was alive while awake, this means that he is freed from all the worries that he lives and is going through, so stay with us to learn more interpretations from our website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a dead father in a dream for a single girl, if you see a woman An unmarried woman dreamed that the father had died, and she was sad for him, so he woke up alert. This is an indication that there are new things that this dreaming girl will bring into her life during this time. Likewise, the unmarried dreamer who dreams that the deceased father was sitting with her in the dream, and he died And he is awake. This indicates that this father wants to pray for him and constantly bless his soul. Either the dreaming lonely girl dreams of sitting for a long time looking at her deceased father in a dream. This is an indication of her great fear at this time about the direction of something. And the dreaming woman The unmarried woman who sees in a dream that the sick father died while he is alive and awake. Fidel must get rid of all the things in which he lives and pass on. See also: Interpretation of seeing the father in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing the deceased father in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman dreams that her father The deceased was sitting with her while he was dead while he was awake. It indicates the problems that this married woman will see in her life. If the dead father is alive and awake and he dies in the dream and the married woman is sad for him in the dream. It shows her extreme fear of losing her father and God knows best. And the married woman who sees The dream is that she was looking at the dead father and he was dead in the dream and he was sad. He declares that he wants alms and prayers for his soul at this hour. And seeing a married woman in a dream means seeing a dead father, and his appearance was very bad in the dream. This is an indication of her many evil words about her deceased father. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a deceased father in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman dreams that her deceased father was asking her to eat in a dream. This is an indication of the charity that this deceased father wants in the afterlife. God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if a divorced woman looks at her deceased father in a dream and feels... Feeling sorry for him. She expresses her fear of an important issue that will end at this time in her life. A divorced woman who sees her dead father washing in a dream cries. Fidel indicates her father’s long life in life and the happy life that he will live. And if a divorced woman sees in a dream that her father is alive and dead in the dream And he was smiling and smiling. It is the new life that will be accepted, God willing. If the dreamer looks at his dead father in a dream and wakes up, he is alive. This is an indication that there is something alive in him and sad for him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing.
